name: Sweaterknit Kimono Wrap Dress
description:
Comfy DVF in training. Our body and age-appropriate “wrap dress” has a high-cut Kimono-fold-over neckline that makes it possible to wear this great dress by itself or layered over a tee for extra coziness. Our dress can be worn alone and hits mid thigh or paired with our Easy-On Legging for a perfect cooler weather outfit. Flutter sleeves hit above the elbow for sweet girly styling and ample allowance for movement. Ties securely in two places on the inside, and on the outside at the arm. And, is perfectly packable for a go-anywhere travel staple.

Detail:

Rayon/Cotton blend. Sizes are true to size. Seams hit at shoulder and are slightly fitted with flutter sleeve ends. Sleeve hits at 1/2 arm length. Minimal shrinkage. Wash on cold with like colors. Dry on cool heat or lay flat to dry as preference would dictate. Roll to pack for best results.

Available Colors:

Grey, Ballet Pink, Snow White, Light Yellow and Black

Note: Our Light Yellow colorway is shown in the editorial image associated with this product set.

name: Infant Loungy Gown
description:
Especially for newborns our gown is classically styled with lap-shoulders and long sleeves for extra comfort as the littlest ones lounge about. And, great for quick-change options without snaps and buttons. Signature owl positioned on baby’s belly and is the perfect accompaniment with our other layette basics.

Detail:
Neckband designed for easy on/off, elongated body, shrinks one-size after wash/dry. 100% interlock cotton. Not intended for sleepwear. Made in the USA with love. Fashioned with signature grosgrain ribbon embellishment and clear rhinestones for that extra Petit Couture touch.

Colors:
White with Carbon and Clear Rhinestone Detailing

name: Short-Sleeve Interlock One-Piece
description:
Styled for maximum comfort and fit on infants of all sizes our snuggly basic one-piece will be a lived-in favorite. Interlock 100% cotton ensures a sturdier feel and excellent recovery. Long-sleeved and short-sleeved options with our signature owl.

Detail: Neckband designed for easy on/off, elongated body, shrinks one size when put in dryer. 100% interlock cotton. Made in the USA with love. Fashioned with signature grosgrain ribbon embellishment and rhinestones for that extra Petit Couture touch. Sold separately and paired as part of our Baby Bling set.

Colors:

White with Carbon (Black) and Clear Rhinestone Detailing

name: Long-Sleeved Interlock One-Piece
description:
Styled for maximum comfort and fit on infants of all sizes our snuggly basic one-piece will be a lived-in favorite. Interlock 100% cotton ensures a sturdier feel and excellent recovery. Long-sleeved and short-sleeved options with our signature owl.

Detail:
Neckband designed for easy on/off, elongated body, shrinks one size when put in dryer. 100% interlock cotton. Made in the USA with love. Fashioned with signature grosgrain ribbon embellishment and rhinestones for that extra Petit Couture touch. Sold separately and paired as part of our Baby Bling set.

Colors:
White with Carbon and Clear Rhinestone Detailing

name: Organic Short-Sleeve One-Piece
description:
Just as our classic Signature Collection one-pieces are styled for maximum comfort and fit for infants, so too our our babyrib organic one-pieces. Truly soft to the touch and highly washable - you will feel great about rockin the organic trend. Short-sleeved bodies with our signature owl complete the look.

Detail:
Neckband designed for easy on/off, elongated body, shrinks one size when put in dryer. 100% babyrib organic cotton. Made in the USA with love. Fashioned with signature grosgrain ribbon embellishment and rhinestones for that extra Petit Couture touch. Ink treatments are water-based. Sold separately and paired as part of our Organic Baby Must-Have Set.

Colors:
Natural with Carbon, Blue with Dream, Brown with Carbon, Yellow with Carbon.

name: Knot Hat White
description:
Our baby rib knot hat is light enough for summer newborns and heavy enough to be a winter staple. The sizing with also work for kids who love the bohemian beanie look which is so chic. Perfectly accompanies most Petit Couture items.

Detail: 

One size, adjustable top knot for expansion, shrinks one size when put in dryer. 100% cotton. Made in the USA with love. Fashioned with signature grosgrain ribbon embellishment for that extra Petit Couture touch.

Colors:

White with Carbon (black) and Clear Rhinestone Detailing

Sizes:

One Size

name: Organic Knot Hat
description:
Our organic baby rib knot hat is light enough for summer newborns and heavy enough to be a winter staple. The sizing with also work for kids who love the bohemian beanie look which is so chic. Perfectly accompanies all Petit Couture items.
Detail:
One size, adjustable top knot for expansion, shrinks one size when put in dryer. 100% cotton. Made in the USA with love. Fashioned with signature grosgrain ribbon embellishment for that extra Petit Couture touch. Ink treatments are water-based. Sold separately and paired as part of our Organic Baby Must-Have Set.

Colors:
Natural with Carbon, Blue with Dream, Brown with Carbon, Yellow with Carbon.

Sizes:
One Size

name: Infant Karate Pant White
description:
Infant and Toddler karate pants for everyday/everywhere. Straight legs with moderate flare for infants; wider flare cut for toddlers. These baby rib pants complete the signature Petit Couture ensemble and are the perfect accompaniment to our Long-Sleeved Crews, and Short-Sleeved Lap and Cap-Sleeved Ts. Sold separately and as a set with select items.

Detail:
16 ½” inseam (toddler), 9″ inseam (infant), elastic waist, shrinks one size when put in dryer. 100% cotton. Made in the USA with love. Fashioned with signature grosgrain ribbon embellishment and rhinestones for that extra Petit Couture touch.

Colors:
White with White Rhinestone Detailing

name: Signature Burnout Crew
description:
What cool kids live in. Our Signature burnout is amazingly soft and our kid's personal favorite. Layer it on cooler days or alone on the days you dream about reliving.

Details: 50/50 Cotton Poly blend. Washable/Dryable. 

Colors:
White and Black

Sizes: 
Sizing runs large with minimal shrinkage. 12-18 months, 2, 3, 4 toddler.

name: Signature Long-Sleeve Play Shirt
description:
A kid favorite! Our long-sleeve play shirt with our chunky glitter owl is a treasured favorite amongst the tot set. Choose from Silver or Gold glitter options or our organic carbon (black) ink treatment, pair this staple with our Kennedy skirt or another treasured favorite at home!

Detail: Baby rib 100% cotton, form fitting, shrinks one size when put in dryer. Made in the USA with love. Fashioned with signature grosgrain ribbon embellishment and rhinestones for that extra Petit Couture touch.

Colors:

Black with Gold Glitter Owl
Pink with Gold Glitter Owl
White with Carbon Owl

name: Signature Short-Sleeve Play Shirt
description:
Our cap sleeve is a must have and a wardrobe stable. Perfectly pairs with our signature Karate pant. Signature owl detailing and bling are extra luxe. Detail: Baby rib 100% cotton, form fitting, shrinks one size when put in dryer. Made in the USA with love. Fashioned with signature grosgrain ribbon embellishment and rhinestones for that extra Petit Couture touch.

Colors:
Black with Star (Silver Glitter) Treatment and Black Rhinestones; Pink with Gold Glitter and Clear Rhinestone details.

name: Rockin Ribbed Tank
description:
Summer is in full swing with our Signature Collection Tank. Very soft baby rib cotton fabric and our Signature Collection 'owl' make this a favorite among the tot set.

Detail: Baby rib 100% cotton, form fitting, shrinks one size when put in dryer. Made in the USA with love. Fashioned with signature grosgrain ribbon embellishment and rhinestones for that extra Petit Couture touch.

Colors: Black with Silver Metallic and Pink with Gold Metallic

name: Sweaterknit Ruffle Cardigan
description:
Tea party in the Hamptons? Bouncy house at the beach? Wherever your day takes you, our go-anywhere, dress-up or be-your-casual-self cardigan has just the right amount of ruffle to make her feel pretty. Our rayon/cotton yarn provides for cozy softness and perfect wash-ability making our Ruffle Cardigan one of the best travel companions since in-car DVD players. And, is perfectly packable for a go-anywhere travel staple.

Detail:
Rayon/Cotton blend. Sizes are true to size. Seams hit at shoulder. Sleeve lengths are longer than ¾ and just a hair shorter than full sleeve so as not to encourage goop from gathering. Minimal shrinkage. Wash on cold with like colors. Dry on cool heat or lay flat to dry as preference would dictate. Roll to pack for best results.

Available Colors:
Grey, Ballet Pink, Snow White, Light Yellow and Black

name: Classic Ruffle Sweaterknit Wrap Skirt
description:
If Tiffany catered tea-parties for 5 year olds this would be the uniform (when coupled with our too chic for words Classic Boatneck Sweater). This classic wrap skirt with single band ruffle is the perfect length for little ladies who lunch and then do some monkey bars after. Hits above the knee with a double-ruffle effect for a little something extra in the front. Buttons securely, and easily, on the inside and ties on the outside. And, is perfectly packable for a go-anywhere travel staple.

Detail:
Rayon/Cotton blend. Sizes are true to size. Seams hit at shoulder and are slightly fitted with bell bottom sleeve ends. Sleeve hits at ¾ arm length. Minimal shrinkage. Wash on cold with like colors. Dry on cool heat or lay flat to dry as preference would dictate. Roll to pack for best results.

Colors:
Grey, Ballet Pink, Snow White, Light Yellow and Black

Note:
Our Light Yellow option is not shown. Please refer to our Classic Boatneck or Kimono Wrap Dress for a color sample.

name: Sofie Tutu Tulle Skirt
description:
Edgy princess couture – that’s our Sofie and our skirt. Our Sofie Tutu Tulle Skirt is the perfect pouf option for girls who love dress up and want to bring it to the playground, playdate or everyday. Pairs perfectly with our Signature Playshirt and Tank. Named after our designer’s daughter Sofie, this skirt took into account all of the requirements a perfect skirt for a princes should. Sounds good when twirled? Check. Bounces when walked? Check. Matches most everything? Check. Feels good when worn? Check. Mom loves it cause it’s cool? Check.
Detail:Nylon Tulle. Polyester lining. Exposed elastic waistband. Sizes are true to size. Hemline hits above or at the knees. Wash on cold with like colors, hang dry or lay flat for best results. Made in the USA.

Colors: Graphite with black trim, Snowfairy White with black trim, Ballet Pink with white trim (not shown)

Sizes: 3-6, 6-12, 12-18, 18-24, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8

name: Kennedy Pleat Skirt
description:
Party to attend and not sure if there will be a rope swing? Our Kennedy Pleat Skirt is a wardrobe staple and perfect for the special occasion where playing might be involved. Our skirt has a generous sweep for twirling and allows for lots of movement for more active tots. Pairs with everything from our Signature Tank to our Boatneck or Ruffled Cardigan this skirt will be a parent and child favorite.

Detail:Cotton blend – twill and sateen. Sizes are true to size. Hemline hits at or below knees. Covered elastic waistband at back and flat panel front ensures proper fit. Wash on cold with like colors. Hang dry or lay flat for best results. Made in the USA.

Colors: Navy Link, Multi Stripe, Yellow Fleur,  Black Pebble

Sizes: 12-18, 18-24, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6

name: Infant Swaddling Blanket White
description:
Wrap your little one in style in our Signature Collection Infant Swaddling Blanket. Our 100% interlock cotton is the perfect snuggly companion for your little one as they learn the ropes of life on the outside. Perfectly constructed to swaddle with enough thickness to not have to double up. Our very large Signature Owl embellishes the back of this special swaddler so your tot is tres chic as they take in the world.

Detail:
31 ½" x 31 ½" with rounded corners. 100% cotton. Made in the USA with love. Fashioned with signature grosgrain ribbon embellishment for that extra Petit Couture touch.

Colors:
White with Carbon (Black)

name: Easy-On Sweaterknit Legging
description:
An elegant take on a wardrobe staple, our leggings are cozy, durable and pair perfectly with our Kimono-Style Dress, Classic Boatneck Sweater (for a slightly Beatnik look) or even our Cardigan for a look we think Grace Kelly might have liked for her tot set. Covered elastic waistband sits at hip and pulls on easily and is extra comfy.

Detail:
Rayon/Cotton blend. Sizes are true to size. Ankle length. Covered elastic waistband, sits at hip. Wash on cold with like colors. Dry on cool heat or lay flat to dry as preference would dictate. Roll to pack for best results.

Colors: 
Black, Light Yellow, Grey, Ballet Pink, Snowfairy White

name: Sparkle Dress
description:
Our Signature Collection Sparkle Dress is the perfect compliment to your child's wardrobe for vacation, playing with pals or going to school in style. Endless wearing possibilities so our dress can pair with leggings, be worn alone or layered over a favorite t-shirt. We know you, and the fave tot in your life, will love our Signature Collection Sparkle Dress. Our richly detailed glitter owl will sparkle and last as long as your child can wear this special dress. And, it's easily packable and washable for easy care.

Detail: Baby rib 100% cotton, form fitting, shrinks one size when put in dryer. Made in the USA with love. Fashioned with signature grosgrain ribbon embellishment and rhinestones for that extra Petit Couture touch.

name: Classic Sweaterknit Boatneck Pull-On
description:
Katherine Hepburn on a Chris Craft, except mini. That’s our Classic Boatneck Pull-On. Pairs perfectly with our Classic Ruffle Wrap Skirt or our Easy-On Legging. This is our #1 go to fave sweater style ever and we wanted to make it mini for the beautiful tots in our lives so they could feel comfy and you could see them looking chic in all of their travels. And, is perfectly packable for a go-anywhere travel staple.

Detail:

Rayon/Cotton blend. Sizes are true to size. Seams hit at shoulder and are slightly fitted with bell bottom sleeve ends. Sleeve hits at ¾ arm length. Minimal shrinkage. Wash on cold with like colors. Dry on cool heat or lay flat to dry as preference would dictate. Roll to pack for best results.

Colors: Light Yellow, Snowfairy White, Ballet Pink, Black, Grey

name: Simone Pleat Dress
description:
Twiggy’s fashion sense meets fine art and named after our designer’s first born. We like to think of our Simone Pleat Dress as a work of art that is wearable, fun and is the life of the party – just like our Simone. Appropriately form-fitting this fun dress has generous arm holes and a neckline that ensures wearability. Elegant and fun detailing like our exposed chunky zipper and diamond mesh flutter sleeves make this a modern choice in any girls wardrobe! Layer with our Ruffled Cardigan for a grown-up dressy look.

Detail: Cotton blend – twill and sateen. Polyester trim. Stainless steel zipper and buttons. Sizes are true to size. Hemline hits at or below knees. Exposed metal zipper with metal button details on front pleat placket. Wash on cold with like colors. Hang dry or lay flat for best results. Made in the USA.

Colors: Classic Red, Mod Grey/Yellow, Black Pebble, Multi-Stripe
